name: Vendetta for a Samurai
description:
Incarnate a Samurai. His master is at war with the most powerful man, the shogun. A plot to kill the master has been engaging and finally, the man of the shogun assassinates the master. The samurai become rônin and decide to avenge his master in killing the shogun.

The goal of this game is finally to kill the shogun, but for that. there are multiple difficulties. I thank my game with multiple levels. And on this level, the goal is to flee the village because the samurai is chase by shoguns man.

This game has been created during my first year in L3di.
